title: Apt for Sublease
laundry: application fee details: Fee included w/deposit
posting_body: I’m trying to sublease my apartment located in the Westchase/Westheimer area.
My mom recently has been diagnosed with a terminal illness and I had to move to San Antonio to be her caretaker.
I have a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment.
Washer & dryer in unit as well as gym & washing facilities on property.
It is within walking distance of local bus line as well as various eating places, as well as shopping strip including Target & Whole Foods.
I’m hoping to find someone in need of a place that could be a blessing to me as I blessing to you.
Perfect for a couple, student, etc.
